overview: With more than 18 years of experience in the technology industry, Mr. Culverhouse possesses deep expertise across a wide range of enterprise software. Prior to joining Stratavia, he served as senior vice president, North American Sales for SeeBeyond, with responsibility for all sales operations for North America. Prior to SeeBeyond, Mr. Culverhouse served as senior vice president, worldwide sales and field operations for Interwoven, the industryâ€™s premier content management solution provider. Prior to Interwoven, Mr. Culverhouse served as IBMâ€™s vice president, SMB & Channel Sales, Data Management. Working closely with IBMâ€™s global business units, he was responsible for direct and channel sales internationally within the enterprise software space, including companies such as SAP, PeopleSoft, Siebel Systems, Ariba, and JD Edwards. In addition to his tenure at Interwoven and IBM, Culverhouse served as VP of U.S. Sales for Informix, and held a senior sales and business development position at Tektronix. Thor received his MBA from The University of Portland, and BS in Electrical Engineering from Washington State University.

milestones.description: Thor Culverhouse successfully led a transaction where HP acquired Stratavia.
